scripts.nuke: rm -rf package-lock.json node_modules && npm install && lerna exec "rm -f package-lock.json" && lerna clean --yes && lerna bootstrap && lerna exec --stream -- "test -f package-lock.json || npm install --package-lock-only"
scripts.lint:prettier: prettier "**/*.{js,html}" --list-different || (echo '↑↑ these files are not prettier formatted ↑↑' && exit 1)
scripts.lint: npm run lint:polymer && npm run lint:eslint && npm run lint:prettier
scripts.win-lint: npm run win-lint:polymer && npm run lint:eslint && npm run lint:prettier
scripts.format: npm run format:polymer && npm run format:prettier && npm run format:eslint
scripts.win-format: npm run win-format:polymer && npm run format:prettier && npm run format:eslint
